issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Cannot complete the install because one or more required items could not be found.
  Software being installed: AngularJS support for PHP (PDT) 0.10.0.201506182210 (angularjs-eclipse-php-feature.feature.group 0.10.0.201506182210)
  Missing requirement: Eclipse AngularJS PHP - Core 0.10.0.201506182210 (org.eclipse.angularjs.php.core 0.10.0.201506182210) requires 'bundle org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.web.core 0.0.0' but it could not be found
  Cannot satisfy dependency:
    From: AngularJS support for PHP (PDT) 0.10.0.201506182210 (angularjs-eclipse-php-feature.feature.group 0.10.0.201506182210)
    To: org.eclipse.angularjs.php.core [0.10.0.201506182210]
fields.summary: AngularJS will not install within Aptana Studio 3

comments.body: Is there any current step-by-step solution to this?

Hello,

We couldn't reproduce this issue. We're able to install Aptana Studio successfully in our environment.

*Testing Environment:*
Mac OSx : 10.9.5
Aptana Studio version: 3.6.1

Thanks.
